title: Tommy Vext: Exes, Metal and Almost Being Murdered
itunes:title: Tommy Vext: Exes, Metal and Almost Being Murdered
description:
It's a wild one this week as Bunnie welcomes rocker, singer, and songwriter Tommy Vext. He opens up about everything from his twin brother to former bands, past relationships, and his sobriety. Tommy talks about his upcoming co-headlining tour with Struggle Jennings, his issues with the current metal industry, and the call that saved his life. 

"Getting sober, you really have to get to know yourself." - Bunnie 
 
Bunnie: www.dumbblondeunrated.com
Tommy Vext: IG | Website | Music 
 
David Vincent 
Bob Larson
